name: Blue Floral Locket Necklace
description:
Blue Floral Locket Necklace 

Shades of blue resin embellish the brass filigree the front of this brass locket. The embellished brass filigree is firmly embedded on the locket. 

Locket is approximately 1 1/4 inches (31 mm) round. The front and back of the locket have been coated with a coat of pearly-blue resin.

Locket opens with room for two photos or a small keepsake.

The locket is connected to a sturdy chain with a brass connector. Chain, clasp and connectors all have an oxidized brass finish. 

The chain is brass ox plated steel (for strength) measures approximately 18 inches (46 cm) around. If you prefer a different size chain, please indicate the chain length when checking out.

name: Purple Oval Locket Necklace
description:
Purple Oval Locket Necklace -  Art Deco Style

Black, pearl-white resin and shades of purple resins embellish the brass filigree on the front of this brass locket.  The embellished brass filigree is firmly attached to the locket.   

The oval locket measures approximately 1 1/8 inches (29 cm) long (not including the top loop) and 7/8 inches (22 mm) wide. The front and back of the locket have been coated with a pearly-plum-purple resin.

Locket opens with room for two photos or a small keepsake.

The locket is connected to a sturdy chain with a brass connector. Chain, clasp and connectors all have an oxidized brass finish. 

The chain is brass ox plated steel (for strength) measures approximately 18 inches (46 cm) around. If you prefer a different size chain, please indicate the chain length when checking out.

Locket is approximately 1 1/4 inches (31 mm) round. The front and back of the locket have been coated with a thin coat of pearly-yellow resin.

Locket opens with room for two photos or a small keepsake.

The locket is connected to a sturdy chain with a brass connector. Chain, clasp and connectors all have an oxidized brass finish. 

The chain is brass ox plated steel (for strength) measures approximately 18 inches (46 cm) around. If you prefer a different size chain, please indicate the chain length when checking out.

name: Green Floral Locket Necklace
description:
Green Floral Locket  Necklace

Shades of green resins enhance the brass filigree the front of this brass locket. The embellished brass filigree is firmly embedded on the locket. 

Locket is approximately 1 1/4 inches (31 mm) round. The front and back of the locket are coated with a thin coat of semi-transparent emerald-green resin.

Locket opens with room for two photos or a small keepsake.

The locket is connected to a sturdy chain with a brass connector. Chain, clasp and connectors all have an oxidized brass finish. 

The chain is brass ox plated steel (for strength) measures approximately 18 inches (46 cm) around. If you prefer a different size chain, please indicate the chain length when checking out.
